headline: JPMorgan and Citigroup Lift Price Targets on L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX)
summary: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) is among the 10 best American defense stocks to buy according to Wall Street analysts. On February 5, JPMorgan raised its price target on the stock to $395 from $340 while reiterating an Overweight rating. The firm noted that the company was in the midst of a transformation. On the same […]
